summary: The module implements an integration with the Opik platform to capture and transmit LLM request and response details, usage statistics, and tracing information. It handles asynchronous batch delivery, error management, and provides helper utilities for configuration loading, payload sanitization, identifier generation, usage object creation, and extraction of trace and span identifiers.
business_intent: To provide observability and monitoring of LLM interactions by sending structured telemetry to Opik, enabling analytics, debugging, cost tracking, and performance insights for applications that use large language models.
